translation.Message_0_Page_0: Excellent, let's put an end to this. We've been able to detect some scrambled messages that get sent after O'1800 everyday. The signal is too weak to be coming from down inside the bunker so it is likely being broadcasted from some of the remaining equipment in the surface base.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: When you find them, you'll need these handcuffs. If you happen to lose them the cable ties will work too. We want this traitor alive, so don't do anything stupid.
